sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import '../ProfilePage.css' import fetchData from '../../../utils/fetchData' import { ImageGet } from '../../../utils/ImageControl' interface ProfileBarProps { id: number } function Profilebar({ id }: ProfileBarProps) { const [privacy, setPrivacy] = useState('') const [data, setData] = useState<{ name: string nickName?: string date: string avatar?: File about?: string privacy: string }>({ name: '', date: '', privacy: '' }) const [avatar, setAvatar] = useState('') useEffect(() => { fetchData(`users/profile/${id}`, setData) ImageGet(`user/${id}`, setAvatar) }, []) const handlePrivacy = () => { fetch('http://localhost:8080/api/users/modify', { method: "POST", credentials: "include" }) fetchData(`users/profile/${id}`, setData) } return (

{data.name}

Date of birth:

{data.date}

{data.about ?

About:

{data.about}

: <>}

Privacy:

{data.privacy}

) } export default Profilebar
